p: Recent data indicated that SARS-CoV-2 binds to the ACE2 receptor ( Andersen et al., 2020), using this receptor for entry into human cells. Therefore, it is unlikely that CCR5 or CCR5Î”32 have some significant effect on the susceptibility or resistance to SARS-CoV-2 infection. However, CCR5 may have some impact on the clinical course of SARS-CoV-2 infection.
